document_data.caption: A map showing Blackstone House in Immilmar.
document_data.name: Blackstone House
document_data.mainbody: '''Blackstone House''' was an [[inn]] found in the capital city of [[Immilmar]] in [[Rashemen]] in the {{YearlinkName|1367}}.{{Cite interactive atlas}}
document_data.Location: The inn was located in the southwest section of the city near the [[Temple of Chauntea]].
document_data.Description: Blackstone House derived its name from the shiny dark [[granite]] used for its construction.
document_data.Activities: Blackstone House catered primarily to foreign merchants. The inn provided a nice selection of [[wine]]s and [[ale]]s and cuisine from a dozen different nations. Patrons appreciated the comforts of the inn even though at 5 [[gp]] per night for a room, and 3 [[sp]] per meal, they were not cheap by any means.
